files_changed.summary: Created new version file with semantic version 0.4.0.
Added get_system_version() helper and integrated it into run_manifest initialization.
Updated generate_audit_summary to include system_version in run_metadata, falling back to VERSION file if manifest missing.
Updated report generation to display system_version in console header, JSON output, and Markdown format.

behavior_verified: Run manifest includes system_version populated from VERSION file.
Run report displays System Version in header.
Pipeline execution remains deterministic (no LLM calls for versioning).
